Using multiple correspondence analysis and the k-means clustering algorithm, 235,826 eligible participants were clustered into distinct unfavorable sleep patterns [short sleep duration ( n Supplementary Information The online version contains supplementary material available at 10.1007/s43657-023-00144-8.
